title: Prepare Comparative Market Analysis (CMA)
description: A homeowner is considering selling and asks for an estimate of their property's value. The agent needs to prepare a CMA report.

tasks.description: Gather details of the subject property (address, beds, baths, sqft).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the key features of the property to be valued.

tasks.description: Search the MLS for comparable sold, active, and pending properties in the last 6 months within a 1-mile radius.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of at least 3 sold, 3 active, and 2 pending comparable properties.

tasks.description: Generate a CMA report summarizing the findings and suggesting a listing price range.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formatted CMA report is generated with a summary of the comps and a suggested price range.
